content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 09.03.24 are approximately:

  • personnel - 420270 (+850) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6712 (+6)
  • combat armored vehicles - 12823 (+25)
  • artillery systems - 10428 (+53)
  • RSWW - 1012 (+1)
  • air defense means - 707 (+3)
  • aircraft - 347 (0)
  • helicopters - 325 (0)
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-8041 (+43)
  • Winged rockets - 1919 (0)
  • ships / boats - 26 (0)
  • submarines - 1 (0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 13683 (+85)
  • Special Technique - 1666 (+10)

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source:The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 09.03.24.
title: RF loss per day: minus 850 invaders, 85 units of auto engineering and 6 tanks
author: Army Inform
